verbs.description: [ARG0: Special Counsel Robert Mueller] [V: wants] [ARG1: President Donald Trump ’s former campaign manager Paul Manafort to be put in jail while he awaits trial because he allegedly tampered with witnesses] .
Special Counsel Robert Mueller wants President Donald Trump ’s former campaign manager Paul Manafort to [V: be] put in jail while he awaits trial because he allegedly tampered with witnesses .

Special Counsel Robert Mueller wants [ARG1: President Donald Trump ’s former campaign manager Paul Manafort] to be [V: put] [ARG2: in jail] [ARGM-TMP: while he awaits trial] [ARGM-CAU: because he allegedly tampered with witnesses] .

Special Counsel Robert Mueller wants President Donald Trump ’s former campaign manager Paul Manafort to be put in jail while [ARG1: he] [V: awaits] [ARG2: trial] [ARGM-CAU: because he allegedly tampered with witnesses] .

Special Counsel Robert Mueller wants President Donald Trump ’s former campaign manager Paul Manafort to be put in jail while he awaits trial because [ARG0: he] [ARGM-ADV: allegedly] [V: tampered] [ARG1: with witnesses] .
